documents.document: Aiming to be the angriest person in Edinburgh by the end of the day.

Unbind PC from domain1, bind to domain2 - reboot, test. Repeat 24 times.
Gonna be a long day ðŸ¤“
if i actually make it through Q1 of this year without high blood pressure causing an aneurysm .. that's an achievement, right? ðŸ˜•
i see that Mrs. Mayhem over getting her orders
Some days I feel a little bit more invisible than usual.

For a moment, I thought I found the perfect new flat location & price.
Turns out it was in a retirement development. so that's a no then ðŸ˜ž
Yes of course it is. https://t.co/CJ7J1W1cwo
Burns night!! I've got some haggis pakora for later, but nae whisky. ðŸ˜žliving the dream (on elm street)
not impressed with the ESPC search, refined to Edinburgh but it gave me a plot of land on Islay... is that my sign to F**k the F**k off?

Ready to get her orders. ðŸ˜• https://t.co/DIhWlusokS
Call me cynical, but I find it hard to believe that that narcissistic has anyone's interest truly at heart.
Meh! Can't watch this any more. But one Lasted longer than first anticipated.
My brain still says this is a joke, any moment now someone will say 'gotcha, it's been a prank and the real new president will be revealed.
Don't normally retweet johnston press, but yeah this one will do. https://t.co/mHHB50cHoR
Out the single market, so #indyref2 may be on the horizon. Or as I'd like to call it #scoot as in Scotland Oot! ðŸ˜‰
Could only listen to Mayhems speech, re:Brexit. Buttt, was it me or did the tone of her voice come over unconfident?
Gonna be one of those days. inner demons are loud today, patience is paper thin and I have to deal with folk I'd rather not. Oh well ðŸ¤¤

Woke to a power cut. It's back on now but with the soothing sounds of the shop alarm below.
Pfft! Who needs sleep anyway

Bit ticked awf ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜¡
All I wanted was a quiet corner to have a beer an read a book.
I should really start looking at flats again - I 'could' see two this afternoon, alas motivation is in negitive numbers. Pffft!
I'm not American, but I'll miss mr @BarackObama, A great statesman, who served his terms with dignity & respect during difficult times.
@Kingofporty first shot I thought of St. Andrews castle, may not be there but looked familiar. - nice photos ðŸ‘

Reenabled Adsense on one of my sites - first add "we buy any house" ffs, life mocks me.

@bambubr aye, & good luck to them. But by end February it'll probably be back to normal.
Who were all the strangers at the gym tonight. ðŸ˜ unusualy busy for a Wednesday evening.

Ughhhh! Think that's me starting to sober up.
Back to reality. ðŸ¤¤
@purps70 sometimes one could be forgiven for thinking that life is just one long perpetual nightmare.
Usually at this time of year, I feel it's been an anti climax, but nothing it's been ever so flat, not even a meh!
Wait, what! I have to go back to work tomorow. ðŸ˜

Scottish problems no lagavulin, have to make do with laphroaig ðŸ˜

Gonna give my dad a computer tomorrow. He in his 70s, his first one, i await the phone calls ðŸ˜€
But it's all good.
Been in this flat ~ year and a half, I promised myself by the end of 2016 I'd be ofski, a new lovely place of my own. Yet I'm still here. ðŸ˜•
Getting late in Auld Reekie, so to who I've missed I hope you've had a braw wee day. ðŸ˜Š https://t.co/iL4ybSzl6p
Second year in a row, I don't feel remotely festive.

I feel auld... I've been in this job for 17 years. I'd like to say it 17 years of failure, but we all know is so much much more.

Should've really looked at flats today, been dragging my feet to long now.

Due to issues with water supply, I had to use the unisex changing facilities at the gym.

This alt-right movement is the US is frightening & soul-destroying.
Humanity is fucked.

Another day living the dream.....
..... On Elm Street. ðŸ˜•

Why folk insist on coming to work when they have a cold/flu - whatever.
It's the one time where sharing isn't caring. Keep it tae yersel
I swear it's warmer outside than it is inside this flat. Brrrrrrrrr. â„ï¸

One of the biggest lies told, "things get better" they stagnate at best.
